Content:: Berty Premalal Dissanayake (15 July 1954 – 27 September 2013) was the chief Minister of the North Central Province of Sri Lanka from June 1999 to 2012.[1][2][3][4] He was of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party and part of the United People's Freedom Alliance.[5] He died on 27 September 2013.[6]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
